rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 408px; height: 1px; padding-top: 35px; margin-left: 36px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: shadow.normalBias の超ざっくりとしたイメージ

switch.text: shadow.normalBias の超ざっくりとしたイメージ

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 121px; height: 1px; padding-top: 325px; margin-left: 29px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 128, 240), rgb(50, 160, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 0, 0), rgb(255, 144, 144)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(255, 0, 0), rgb(255, 144, 144));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 0, 0), rgb(255, 144, 144)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(255, 0, 0), rgb(255, 144, 144));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(204, 204, 204), rgb(62, 62, 62));

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 0, 0), rgb(255, 144, 144)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(255, 0, 0), rgb(255, 144, 144));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 308px; height: 1px; padding-top: 335px; margin-left: 151px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #FF0000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#FF0000, #ff9090); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
オブジェクトの大きさがshadow.normalBiasに設定した
値分だけ大きく/小さく認識されるイメージ
(シャドウマップを生成するLightカメラから)

switch.text: オブジェクトの大きさがshadow.normalBiasに設定した...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 390px; margin-left: 27px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #007FFF;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#007FFF, #319eff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: shadow.normalBiasを反映したオブジェクトの深度からシャドウマップを生成する
